betterquesting:10.desc:8:
To get Aluminum, you will need alumina.  You can get alumina from washing Bauxite in a sluice.  You can also get alumina from centrifuging sapphire purified ores.

Look for the following:

- Bauxite ore.  This would be a layered rock type similar to coal, lignite, and milky quartz.

- Sapphire ores.  An alternate way to get alumina dusts.

- You will need some silicon dioxide.  You can use Milky Quartz, Nether Quartz, Certus Quartz, or you left over flint dust.

§e§e
Warning:  Alumina melts at 2345K so you are likely to melt your ceramic crucible if you throw alumina in there.

§b§6
Processing Path:

Alumina dusts + Hexafluorosilicic Acid -> [ Mixer ] -> Molten Aluminum Fluoride + water + Silicon Dioxide

Alumina dusts + Molten Aluminum Fluoride -> [ LV Electrolyzer ] -> Aluminum
